name: abacavir
about: Abacavir (also called Ziagen®) is used to treat infection caused by the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).

name: alendronate
about: lendronate (also called Fosamax®) is a medicine that treats or prevents osteoporosis (weak or brittle bones).

name: baclofen
about: Baclofen (also known as Lioresal®) is a medicine that helps relax muscles and prevent muscle spasms.

name: diclofenac
about: Diclofenac (also called Voltaren®) is a man-made steroid that works like a steroid made by the adrenal gland in your body.

name: Napa
about: Napa (Paracetamol) is a fast acting and safe analgesic with marked antipyretic property.

name: famciclovir
about: Famciclovir (also called Famvir®) is used to treat viral infections. Famciclovir is available as 125-mg and 250-mg white round tablets and as a 500-mg white oval tablet

name: fenadin 120
about: Fenadin 120mg Tablet is an anti-allergy medicine used in the treatment of allergic symptoms such as runny nose, congestion or stuffiness, sneezing, itching, swelling, and watery eyes.

name: TPC
about: It is indicated in the treatment of polyneuropathy of any origin such as diabetic, alcoholic or toxic neuropathies,neuritis, cervical syndrome, shoulder-arm syndrome
